desc: Rustic Rays Candle Co. is a home fragrance company that focuses on using natural ingredients to create soy wax candles, soy wax melts for warmers, diffusers, and air + linen sprays. Our products are proudly handcrafted in Glen Carbon, Illinois.

layout.text: Treat Yourself To Better Home Fragrance
100% soy wax candles made with phthalate free premium fragrance oils and lead & zinc free cotton wicks. What could be better?!
